name: Hamster Simulator
description:
Oh no the batteries are out of power!  Recharge the batteries by having the hamster run and charge them up.  Alternately press left and right on the keyboard and the faster you hit those keys, the faster the hamster will run!  Fill the battery within 30 seconds!

Made for Ludum Dare 39 in less than 48 hours!  See our submission page here!
